name: Brave Web / Internet Search
description: Search the web / internet using Brave for up-to-date information. Use the 'query' parameter with your search terms.

query.description: The search query or search terms to find on the web. Example: 'latest AI news' or 'Python programming tutorial'

name: Web Content Extractor
description: Extract clean, readable content from a web page URL, removing ads, headers, footers, and other non-content elements. Use the 'url' parameter with a valid HTTP/HTTPS URL.

url.description: The full URL of the webpage to extract content from. Must be a valid HTTP or HTTPS URL. Example: 'https://example.com/article'

maxLength.description: Maximum length of extracted content in characters (default: 5000)

name: Enhanced Web Search with Content
description: Performs web search and automatically extracts full content from the top results for comprehensive information gathering. Perfect for 'chat with web' functionality. Use the 'query' parameter with your search terms.

query.description: The search query or search terms to find on the web. Example: 'artificial intelligence trends 2024' or 'best programming languages'

extractContent.description: Whether to extract full content from search results (default: true)

maxResults.description: Maximum number of search results to process and extract content from (default: 3)

contentMaxLength.description: Maximum length of extracted content per page in characters (default: 3000)
